name: HoHo and the Fabulous Gays [v1.1.0] [#Enbyjam]
description:
「HoHo and the Fabulous Gays」is an interactive novel. In it you take the role of the titular HoHo, and enter the latest episode of their bizarre misadventures! Your choices affect the outcome of the story, and you're free to inspect special terms to learn more about the strange world HoHo lives in~ ♥︎

The script for this game is over 25,000 words long and has two routes for you to enjoy~

This game is available as to play for FREE in your browser! Make sure to click on that lower-right button to make the game full-screen, as well as using your browser's zoom-in and zoom-out shortcuts to increase/decrease the text size. If you would like to, of course, you can also download the game and run it off of your own browser. Please note that images are not available offline.

One more thing!「HoHo and the Fabulous Gays」was made as a part of #ENBYJAM. It was written and coded in just three days. If you would like to learn more, feel free to read the 「ABOUT」page in the game.

Have issues downloading the game? Get it HERE!

If you enjoy this game, please consider leaving a donation! It would help fund future interactive novels as well as ensure MistreKirin can keep buying the coffee that keeps them writing!
